scripts.test: go generate && cross-env CLICOLOR_FORCE=1 LOG=ln,gr go run .
scripts.dev: go generate && cross-env CLICOLOR_FORCE=1 LOG=ln,debug,gr nodemon --exec go run -race . --signal SIGTERM -e go,
scripts.build: go generate && cross-env yarn build_linux && yarn build_windows && yarn build_macos && yarn build_macos_arm64 && yarn build_arm && yarn build_arm64 && yarn build_rpi
scripts.build_windows: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-windows-amd64.exe
scripts.build_linux: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-linux-amd64
scripts.build_macos: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-macos-amd64
scripts.build_macos_arm64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-macos-arm64
scripts.build_arm: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-linux-arm
scripts.build_arm64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-linux-arm64
scripts.build_rpi: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm GOARM=6 go build -o bin/payhip-discord-bot-rpi-armv6
